title: Bit from Integration With Zoho Flow
description: Zoho is one of the best and most used web applications for business. Zoho Flow integration on form builder application is used to collect information or data from people or customers. The process starts by creating a new flow in Zoho flow, which will consist of different steps. Using this integration you can easily integrate with any web service out there. This documentation gives a quick overview of how to integrate Zoho flow with form builder.

frontMatter.title: Bit from Integration With Zoho Flow
